import React from "react"; function Portfolio(props) { const student = props; const data = student.data.length -1; return ( <> {student.data.map((post, index) => ( (index === data)? ( '' ): ( '' ) (index % 2 == 0) ? (
{post.lifedate}

{post.name}

{post.description}
) : (

{post.name}

{post.description}
{post.lifedate}
) ))} ) } export default Portfolio
